title: Wout van Aert Whacked with €662,000 Severance Payment In Resolution of Long Legal Spat
content:
Court of Cassation cannot save Visma-Lease a Bike superstar from whopping severance payment in final chapter of legal brawl with former employer.

Read the full article at Wout van Aert Whacked with €662,000 Severance Payment In Resolution of Long Legal Spat on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
